name: Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon
description:
Adventures of DaKoo the Dragon® is a classic platformer that focuses heavily on replayability. It takes inspiration and pays homage to the classic games of old using a hand drawn art style.

Arriving home to a village set a blaze, DaKoo® must set out on a journey to discover what has happened.

Play over 150 levels, every run of the game unique. Animations, enemy spawning, and attacks are all subtly randomized to enhance the immersion factor. As you transition from level to level you'll enter special levels where you'll encounter gravity zones, traps, collect shield power-ups and even fly rocket ships . With multiple ways to attack you will take on 5 Bosses among multiple obstacles.





Use rocket ships to take on the enemy!





Use attacks on the ground or in the air to defend or attack enemies!





Use Fireballs to defend or attack enemies and bosses!





Navigate vortex levels through gravity zones using 90 and 180 degree turns!





Use jump combos to take on multiple enemies at the same time and destroy enemy factories!





Use 5 different shields to defend yourself all while traversing through 5 different environments plus multiple Vortex levels!
